formalpara.title: Figure 3. Lateral cell adhesion in par(ZF1) embryos
formalpara.para: (A,C) Surface view of a wild-type embryo (A) or an embryo where PAR-6 has been removed by fusion to the ZF1 domain (C, "par-6(ZF1) embryo" ). Spaces (arrows) can be seen between cells in the par-6(ZF1) embryo where lateral cell surfaces do not contact. (B,D) Lateral view of the interior region of a 26-cell stage wild-type embryo (B) or par-6(ZF1) embryo (D). A space (arrow) has formed between lateral cell surfaces in the par-6(ZF1) embryo. Bar = 5 μ m. Modified and reprinted with permission from Nance et al. (2003).
